text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActDetectedIssueCode

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a ISSUE
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ActSuppliedItemDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ActAdministrativeDetectedIssueCode

name: ActDetectedIssueCode
title: ActDetectedIssueCode
description: Identifies types of detected issues for Act class "ALRT"
